      • addTimeToCurrentDateTime

        public static String addTimeToCurrentDateTime(int minutes,
                                              int hours,
                                              int days,
                                              int months,
                                              int years)
        Method adds/subtracts time from the current dateTime.
        Parameters:
        minutes - are the minutes.
        hours - are the hours.
        days - are the days.
        months - are the months.
        years - are the years.
        Returns:
        the changed dateTime as String.
